channel.title: Cpps on Niiok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cpps on Niiok's Blog

item.title: Cpp Naming rule
item.description: File name fully lower-case word separation expressed as _ (underscore) 1 2 file_name.txt very_good_source_code.c Type name start with capital letter next letters are lower-case word separation expressed as upper-cased first letter 1 2 class SuperDuperClass{}; struct TypeNameExpressedLikeThis{}; Variable name function parameters are included in variable Common variable name fully lower-case space expressed into _ (underscore) 1 2 int integer_variable = 4; int quantity_of_cookies = 0; Class data member name
